name: Vma plus Station
author: Vma plus Co,.Ltd.

sections.description:
Vma plus Station Plugin is a plugin that allows you to easily build a metaverse on WordPress. It enables users to initiate a virtual space and offers features such as free movement within the virtual environment and the option to set destination URLs as thumbnails.

Copyright

Vma plus Station Plugin bundles the following third-party resources:

  • PlayCanvas Engine v1.70.3 (Copyright 2011-2024 PlayCanvas Ltd. All rights reserved.)
    • Licenses: MIT
    • Source: https://github.com/playcanvas/engine

Non-Minified PlayCanvas Engine Source Code:

The non-minified source code for PlayCanvas Engine is included within this plugin for review purposes. You can find it in : playcanvas.js. Users can download to access the individual source code files.

We hope this information clarifies how Vma plus Station utilizes external resources. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out!
sections.installation:
Installation from within WordPress

  • Visit Plugins > Add New.
  • Search for Vma plus Station.
  • Install and activate the Vma plus Station plugin.

Manual installation

  • Upload the entire vma-plus folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ã€€directory.
  • Visit Plugins.
  • Activate the Vma plus Station plugin.
sections.changelog:
2.1.0

  • Improved: Enhanced user interface for a more intuitive experience.
  • Improved: Overall performance and stability.
  • Fixed: Various minor bugs and glitches reported by users.

2.0.3

  • Improved: Overall performance and stability.
  • Fixed: Cannot install conflict.
  • Fixed: Various minor bugs and glitches reported by users.

2.0.2

  • Added: New features to enhance your experience in the metaverse.
  • Improved: Overall performance and stability.
  • Fixed: Issues with image settings layout.

2.0.1

  • Added: New features to enhance your experience in the metaverse.
  • Improved: Overall performance and stability.
  • Fixed: Issues with image upload.
  • Fixed: Various minor bugs and glitches reported by users.

2.0.0

  • Added: Worlds page where you can select your desired metaverse.
  • Added: New features to enhance your experience in the metaverse.

1.0.2

  • Added: Indication for premium features in the free version to encourage upgrades.
  • Added: New pages.

1.0.1

  • Plugin Settings Page Design: Improved the design of the plugin settings page for a more user-friendly experience.
  • Image Selection: Streamlined the process of selecting URLs when choosing images. This allows users to select URLs more easily and efficiently.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
